original: A nice lady took me into a huge, gigantic – at least from a 3-year-old's perspective – room, with tall shelves filled with toys. Ladies from the kindergarten tried to calm me, but there was no use. Fortunately, my mother was still there, talking with a parent of another kid, so she came to me and took me home. And they decided to never take me there again until I was 6 or so.

Per fortuna, mia madre era ancora lì, a parlare con un genitore di un altro bambino, quindi è venuta da me e mi ha portato a casa.
